- **0.3.30**: 
  - Fixed toast dismissal for update notifications to prevent reappearing for 24 hours.
  - Resolved issues with Ollama /embed form data integration.
  - Addressed compatibility problems with OpenAI's o1 models max_completion_tokens parameter.
  - Fixed a critical issue where database changes during pip installations were reverting chat logs, ensuring reliable chat operations.
  - Updated functionality to change the web browser tab title when renaming a chat.

- **0.3.29**: 
  - Improved KaTeX rendering for better display of complex mathematical notation.
  - Corrected 'call' URL parameter functionality for voice calls through URL triggers.
  - Fixed configuration reset on startup to revert settings to defaults reliably.
  - Resolved issues in the filter outlet hook to ensure all filter functions operate correctly.
